page.title: 07The School
page.content: Our school is called Hutton Rudby Primary school. It is placed half-way up Doctors Lane on the left hand side. Our head master is called Mr. Huddleston and we have six more teachers. We have a very big back field where we can play and we hold "Sports Day" on it. We also have a wild garden where we study plants and have a very interesting pond. We also have a lovely chequer board garden where we grow flowers it looks just like a square patch work quilt. At the front there is a playground and it is marked out for a Netball court. The lunches at school are very nice. We are very lucky because our school has a computer and we are all allowed to have a turn on it. I like doing Art and Craft on Wednesday afternoons but I have to remember my apron as well. We have a Parents Association which
